narrative.title: 1St South African Division - 1941Q1
narrative.situation: British Infantry Division (Commonwealth - Union Defence Force) deployed in North Africa during 1941Q1.
narrative.axis_objective: Hold current positions and prevent Allied breakthrough.
narrative.allied_objective: Advance and neutralize Axis defensive positions.

air_support.note: No theater air summary available for this quarter

special_rules: Commonwealth combined-arms operations following British doctrine
Marmon-Herrington armored cars (South African-built) provided unique reconnaissance capability
Experienced in East African terrain and climate conditions
Strong esprit de corps among South African volunteer forces
